import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/logo.svg' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cart_icon/cart_icon.component' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.component' import './header.styles.scss' const Header = ({currentUser}) => { return
SHOP CONTACT {currentUser ?
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
: SIGN IN}
} const mapStateToProps = ({user: { currentUser }, cart: { hidden }}) => ({ currentUser, hidden }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
